title: What would be the vehicle for touring musicians? - Quora

response.answer_text: *Cue old man voice*  Back in my day, the greatest hope of every musician starting out was one of these bad boys:  The good ole white Astro Van of Doom. Dent along the fender and all. I don’t care if you’re Tom fucking Araya, you’re never too metal to drive one of these bad boys. For storing your gear , there really is nothing better than an old Astro. Yeah, the gas mileage sucks, and you’re going to be thinking that the poor thing is either going to blow up or fall apart while you’re driving it, but it’s reliable. You’ll get to that $50 gig that’s 300 miles away not in style, but reliably.
The touring musicians I have met are almost always in a van. It holds people and stuff b
